actions.text: Committee on Rules ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Rules. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Ford. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 259.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: An original resolution to amend the Standing Rules of the Senate to conform with recent changes in the law made by the Legislative Branch Appropriations Act, 1992, and other Acts and to make certain technical correction.

summary.text: Amends the Standing Rules of the Senate to conform the following rules to recent changes made to Federal law: (1) rule XXXVI, outside earned income; (2) rule XXXV, gifts; (3) rule XXXVII, conflict of interest; (4) rule XXXVIII, prohibition of unofficial office accounts; (5) rule XLI, political fund activity; and (6) rule XLII, employment practices.

titles.title: An original resolution to amend the Standing Rules of the Senate to conform with recent changes in the law made by the Legislative Branch Appropriations Act, 1992, and other Acts and to make certain technical correction.
